channel.title: .:Moderator = Banned:
channel.description:
Well I was just fly fishing on my fishing account on Runescape and I came across a player moderator, all I did was just said "Hi," so then he logs off. When I log off and try to log back on later it told me I was banned. What kind of BS is that?
Heres a picture: [IMG]http://img381.imageshack.us/img381/507/untitled29dk.png[/img]
Is there any way I could make it where he loses his rank or anything?

item.title: .:Moderator = Banned:
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“linkinxxpark, post:41, topic:2987”]my friends a mod and one time some guy was cusing at him and muted him for about 43 hours
and he muted me for saying shut up when he spammed me i got pissed so i sent a message cause im in a clan and wel what ever but this isnt right jagex stic, it up their ass they aint cool they need to grow some balls they nerds[/quote]

L2make sense

item.title: .:Moderator = Banned:
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“XmasterX123, post:39, topic:2987”]Go to runescape.com
go to appeal or offence a ban {link} under account recovery
then log into your account when it pops up
next (left) click!!! on view evidence
for IE users click on copy shortcut for Firefox users click on copy link location
past what you coppied in your browser/address bar
go to that place
now look for viewevidence.ws
change viewevidence.ws to appeal.ws
appeal you offence/ban
check back and hope its succsesful!
Thats my mini guide to unbanning yourself

completly poitless
hope someone can use it[/quote]

Not All Blackmarks Have Evidence -.-

Read full topic

item.title: .:Moderator = Banned:
item.dc:creator: @XmasterX123 XmasterX123
item.description:
@XmasterX123 wrote:

Go to runescape.com
go to appeal or offence a ban {link} under account recovery
then log into your account when it pops up
next (left) click!!! on view evidence
for IE users click on copy shortcut for Firefox users click on copy link location
past what you coppied in your browser/address bar
go to that place
now look for viewevidence.ws
change viewevidence.ws to appeal.ws
appeal you offence/ban
check back and hope its succsesful!
Thats my mini guide to unbanning yourself

completly poitless
hope someone can use it

item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Obviously fake… you don’t say a few words and people mass dissapear… It doesn’t work that way trust me. I’ve been a mod before. You have to go through the reporting process just like everybody else, they just pay more attention to your reports.
